Event image is required LinkedIn profile retrieval successful Search distance (meters) Logged out SyncUp Record notification unsuccessful Record notification successful I agree to the Privacy Policy Please read and agree to the Privacy Policy before creating your account PrivacyPolicyActivity Privacy Policy Your Privacy Matters Sync strives to connect people with local professionals to create meaningful and impactful connections that supports their career goals. In line with that mission, is being transparent about what data we collect and how it is being used. By using this service, you consent to Sync using your data in compliance with this privacy policy. Information We Collect You provide data to create a Sync account To create an account manually you provide data including your name, email address, password, job position, company name, industry, and profile image. You provide data from your LinkedIn profile to create an account through LinkedIn account integration To create an account through LinkedIn account integration, you provide data found in your profile including your name, email address, job position, company name, industry, and profile image. Permissions We Request Your Location Sync receives location data from your device as the foundation of the functionality of the application. Location is used to find other local users and events. This location data can be protected through obfuscation that modifies your precise location and stores that for other users to see. The amount of privacy your location data has is modifiable by you. Your Gallery Sync uses your gallery to select images for your profile and created events. The images are stored securely in Firebase Storage Your Devices Near Field Communication Technology Sync uses Near Field Communication (NFC) technology to enhance your in-person networking experiences by providing rapid, near-instantaneous data transfers. Sync currently uses NFC for establishing connections between you and other people when you trigger the SyncUp feature. This feature is not fundamental to the utility of the application and connections can be formed without using NFC. Third-Parties We Use Google Play Services Google Play services is provided by Google and forms the foundation of Sync. Importantly it is used to find the location of the device and for the integration of the Google Maps widget. See Google Play services privacy policy here: https://policies.google.com/privacy?hl=en Firebase Authentication Firebase Authentication is provided by Google and is used to create and authenticate users to gain authorized access to their data. Your account login information, email address and password, are stored securely in their system by using encryption. All data can be deleted and modified to keep it up to date. Firebase’s privacy policy here: https://www.firebase.com/terms/privacy-policy.html Firebase Storage Firebase Storage is provided by Google and is used to store images in the application. These currently consist of your profile image and event profile images. The photo is deleted if you change your profile photo or event image. Firebase’s privacy policy here: https://www.firebase.com/terms/privacy-policy.html Firebase Realtime Databases Firebase Realtime Databases is provided by Google and is used to store your profile data, name, job position, company name, industry, notifications, connection requests, connections, and obfuscated location coordinates. Plus, all event data. All data can be deleted and modified to keep it up to date. See Firebase’s privacy policy here: https://www.firebase.com/terms/privacy-policy.html Picasso Picasso is a library used for cropping and formatting an image selected to upload for either an event image or your profile image. Picasso does not save your photos anywhere. See more information on Picasso here: square.github.io/picasso LinkedIn The LinkedIn API is used for LinkedIn account creation integration. With your permission, Sync uses LinkedIn profile data (name, email, job position, company name, industry, and profile photo) to ease Sync account creation and keep your Sync profile optionally up to date with your LinkedIn profile data. See LinkedIn’s privacy policy here: https://www.linkedin.com/legal/privacy-policy Your Rights Data Retention Sync retains your personal data while the account is in existence despite how frequently you may use the application. Access and Control Your Personal Data Sync provides many options for you to determine the collection and accuracy of the information you provide to the system, from editing profile and event data to choosing the level of location privacy you feel most comfortable with. In compliance with GDPR, you may request to see what data has been collected about you by contacting us. Account Closure If you choose to close your account, all data about you shall be deleted from the system immediately in compliance with GDPR. All information about your account in other user’s accounts (ex. Profile view notifications, connections, etc.) will be deleted immediately. You can delete your account at any point. For further information, contact Sync at info@sync.com profile photo image button Tap devices to add a new connection with NFC profile image event image By Person: By Event: Privacy intensity connection image notifcation image Location details Refresh rate: Time (min) Refresh rate: Distance (meters) System Re-enter New Password New Password New Email Verify Please verify your current account details Account Details Login details are incorrect Update failed.
